data.text: @JeffBurch_ I should have tagged you here. My bad. I can see how you stood up for front line workers with the issue of Dr. Stewart. Take the next step and bang the table for some vaccine for us. We need the immunity!!!
Let's sing Kumbaya, come together and get this done. Give us the tools available and we will take care of the rest!!! Fin 🚑🏥😷👩‍⚕️👨‍⚕️
@samoosterhoff you're the golden boy, we know you have @fordnation's ear, put in a good word for us
@VBadawey I am proud to work in Welland, the centre of your riding. Here at the Welland hospital we are grinding like crazy providing care but we just need a little help to get us over the hump
Gatesy, @Wayne_Gates, you're the man and need no introduction. The moustache speaks for itself. We need your help to shake the tree and get us a few doses in our arms 💉💪
In that spirit, it is time for us to come together @st_catharines @niagarafalls @Welland @portcolborne @townofforterie @NiagaraRegion

Just a few vaccine doses to get some of our facilities out of outbreak would give us some much needed room to breathe. Not to mention keep front line staff safe #COVID19 #CovidVaccine #Pfizer #Moderna
As @mustafahirji pointed out we have dozens of facility outbreaks here in the region which is putting tremendous pressure on COVID and non-COVID care @NHBugBusterDoc @DrLJensen
